Header: Troops Clean Roadsides along A-9 Road
Content: More than 10 Officers and 200 Other Ranks of the 7 of Sri Lanka Light Infantry (SLLI) and the 9 Vijayabahu Infantry Regiment (VIR) on Sunday (30) carried out a roadside cleaning project along the A9 road from the 248 km post (Iranamadu Junction) to the 256 km post at Kilinochchi town to coincide with National Mosquito Prevention week. The project that took several hours was suggested by the General Officer Commanding, 57 Division, Major General Vijitha Ravipriya and conducted under the supervision of  the 571 Brigade Commander.
